oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of James M. Buchanan, Sr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Informal black and white photograph of James McGill Buchanan, Sr., son of Governor John Price Buchanan and father of economist James McGill Buchanan. He is in an office leaning over a desk at which a woman is typing a form.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buchanan family;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: May be reproduced for personal or educational purposes with attribution;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
